name: Anpi
description:
Explore the world as a blind monk. Your soul fish, anpi will lead you the way.

You are on a journey to repair the shrine of Nami. 

Controlls: Mouse and Keyboard only!

Interact: Right mouse click

Inspect: Left mouse click

Direction: Mouse position

Row/Drag: Spacebar

Escape: Quit or Pause Menue

Press the spacebar multiple times to gain speed, but be aware that crashing your boat will damage it.

Credits:

Emily Panzer as 2D and 3D Artist.

Steffen Schreiber as Audio Designer.

Michelle Nims as Level Designer.

Tim Schneider as Story Designer.

Tim Keil as Programmer.

This game was made in about one week and is a submission to the Epic Megajam 2022.

This game was made in Unreal Engine 5.

No third party assets were used. Everything has been done by us.

Anpi and some words may have meanings in the japanese language.

The water ambience sound was ready before gamejam started.
